attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that it is time we all took action and forced out government and other around the world to overthrow this tyrant and restore democracy and end the line of terror from this mad man and his cronies.  We know the reason for lack of intervention up till now has been lack of interest due to lack of oil reserves.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
